allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add file content extraction to Canvas sync

Now fetches and extracts content from:
✅ Text files \(.txt, .md, .json, .xml, etc.\) - full text extracted
✅ PDF files - noted in description for Gemini context
✅ Word docs \(.docx\) - noted in description for Gemini context
✅ All other file types - logged with content type

Enhanced description format with clear sections:
- Assignment Files \(with actual text content\)
- Rubric Criteria \(with rating levels\)
- Quiz Questions \(up to 15, with full question text\)

Gemini now gets complete assignment context including:
- Original description
- All attached file contents \(text-based\)
- Detailed rubric with rating scales
- Full quiz questions with point values

This enables AI to generate study plans based on ACTUAL assignment materials.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add demo user seeding for Hacklahoma presentation

Created Avery Park mock user with realistic 3-day history:
- POST /dev/seed-mock-user endpoint \(dev-only\)
- Email: avery.park@demo.com / Password: demo123

Demo includes:
✅ 3 active goals \(study, workout, sleep\)
✅ 14 total steps earned across 3 days
✅ 10 steps invested \(trail position\)
✅ 4 steps banked \(ready to invest\)
✅ 14 screen time logs \(Notion, Canvas, Instagram, YouTube, etc.\)
✅ 3 goal completion logs
✅ 2 upcoming assignments \(CS 2334, ENGL 1113\)

Step calculation:
- 1 step per hour of productive time
- 3 steps per completed task
- Net productive hours algorithm

History breakdown:
- Feb 6: 4 steps earned \(83 min productive, 36 min wasted\)
- Feb 7: 6 steps earned \(192 min productive, 66 min wasted\)
- Feb 8: 4 steps earned \(96 min productive, 30 min wasted\)

See DEMO_USER.md for full details and testing instructions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
